articles.title: The Morning After: Netflix’s new gaming boss is a former Epic Games exec

articles.author: Matt Burgess
articles.title: A Hacker ‘Ghost’ Network Is Quietly Spreading Malware on GitHub
articles.description: Cybersecurity researchers have spotted a 3,000-account network on GitHub that is manipulating the platform and spreading ransomware and info stealers.
articles.content: A secretive network of around 3,000 ghost accounts on GitHub has quietly been manipulating pages on the code-hosting website to promote malware and phishing links, according to new research seen by W… [+3336 chars]

articles.title: Bing’s AI redesign shoves the usual list of search results to the side
articles.description: Microsoft’s Bing has offered an early look at a new search results page that prominently features AI-generated information while shoving actual search results to the side.
